name: Distant Cackle
summary: It takes a very brave person to enter the laughter-haunted forest where you dwell.
description:
It takes a very brave person to enter the laughter-haunted forest where you dwell. You can cast ventriloquism once per day as a 1st-level occult innate spell.Traits

Gnoll: Gnolls are humanoids that resemble hyenas.
